items.title: Michaelangelo
items.subtitle: Physically the smallest of the Turtles and the least mature. Mikey is easily distracted and enthusiastic about... well, pretty much everything.

items.title: Leonardo
items.subtitle: The leader of the Turtles, Leonardo aspires to be a brave, decisive, perfect hero.

items.title: Raphael
items.subtitle: Raphael is the most violent of the four brothers. A straight-up brawler, he has very little patience for things like stealth, hiding in shadows, or keeping his voice down.

items.title: Donatello
items.subtitle: Donatello is the team inventor and weaponeer. He creates all their gadgets from the simplest bo-staff to their incredible vehicles.

items.title: Rocksteady
items.subtitle: He was originally a human Russian arms dealer with ties to Shredder and The Foot Clan named Ivan Ilyich Steranko

items.title: Bebop
items.subtitle: He was born in 1988 in New York City and that it was he who gave Ivan Steranko his diamond eye.
